name: prolific-email-marketing-automations
description: Email marketing automation platform for managing campaigns across multiple ESPs

scripts.docker:up: docker compose up -d && docker compose logs -f
scripts.docker:up:build: docker compose up -d --build && docker compose logs -f
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.docker:shell:postgres: docker compose exec postgres psql -U prolific -d prolific_email
scripts.docker:prod:migrate: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml --profile migration up db-migrate
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:create: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec backend npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma generate
scripts.clean:docker: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
